snippet: Although only a few Long Island vintners make malbec, samples of current releases suggest that it could become the third most successful red wine in the region.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews malbec wines from Long Island vintners (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Although only a few Long Island vintners make malbec, samples of current releases suggest that it could become the third most successful red wine in the region.

headline.print_headline: Malbec, Doing Fine On Its Own
